why is my ad not delivering though its active ?

Let's try to figure out why your ad isn't delivering even though it's active. Could you provide me with some additional details? Specifically, I'd like to know:
- The campaign start date
- The bidding type you're using
- Your targeting or budget settings
- Any recent changes you've made in the last 72 hours
Once I have this information, I can help you troubleshoot further!
why did i get billed 12 $ from news break ad manager

It sounds like you might have been billed for ad spend on your NewsBreak Ad Manager account. Each ad account has its own billing setup, and charges are typically based on the budget and spend of your active campaigns. If you need more specific details about this charge, I recommend checking your billing section in the Ad Manager or contacting our support team at adsupport@newsbreak.com for further assistance.
you add ad credits, right ? so you shouild not have any additional costs or ?

Ad credits are used as a form of payment for ads, and they should be applied before any charges to your primary payment method. If you have ad credits in your account, they will be used first for your ad spend. However, if your ad spend exceeds the amount of ad credits available, additional costs may be charged to your stored payment method. If you believe there was an error with the billing, please reach out to adsupport@newsbreak.com for further investigation.
will i ever get back that 10 dollars from setting up the payment method ?

Yes, the $10 charge is a temporary card authorization fee. If you run ads, this amount goes towards your advertising budget. If you don't run ads, it will be fully refunded after 7 days if not captured within this time. Stripe cancels the payment and releases the funds.
I'm sorry, I didn't quite understand that. Could you please provide more details or clarify your question?
the 10 dollars never went to ad credits or for ad funds, even though i ran ad campaign. will the sum return to my bank account then `?

If the $10 was not used for your ad campaign, it should be refunded to your bank account after 7 days if not captured. If you have any concerns or need further assistance, please email adsupport@newsbreak.com for help.
its already been 12 days, it has not been returned i
I've sent a request to our support team to investigate the issue with your $10 refund. They will reach out to you soon to help resolve this. Thank you for your patience!
